```{r}
ucla_sec = "blue"
dfk = data.frame(
  TEAM = c("UCLA-H", "UCLA-A", "CIN-A"),
  HELMET = c("blue", "blue", "red")
)
dd = tableGrob(dfk)

find_cell = function(table, row, col, name = "core-fg") {
  l = table$layout
  which(l$t == row & l$l == col & l$name == name)
}

dd$grobs[find_cell(dd, 1, 2, "core-bg")][[1]][["gp"]] = gpar(fill = "#FFFFFF")

grid.draw(dd)
```
